1.title: Characters

11.content:
Ichigo was walking down the street in Karakura Town when all of a sudden he blackk out.
As Ichigo opened his eyes he noticed that everything around him seemed larger. He was about to stand up and look around when suddenly he hears two loud booms from right behind him. He looks back and sees two giant pairs of feet, as he looks up he is astonished to see........
11.title: Ichigo

choices: looks down at you(thinks your a bug)
111.content:
Ichigo wa surprised to see that it was Rukia who he thought would have been in the Soul Society.

Ichigo starts to run towards her shoes but stops halfway when an incredibly powerful odour hits him. He realises that it is coming from Rukias shoes and starts to back away. As he is backing away he noticed her hand reaching down to untie her shoes. As she takes off her shoes the smell intensifies 10 fold. "ahh" she said " it really feels nice to air out my feet every now and again. Ichigo looks up to her face and sees........
111.title: Rukia

1111.content: "Well well now who's the shrimp Ichigo" rukia said with a smirk. "Rukia what the hell happened to what did you do?" Ichigo yelled up at rukia obviously pissed off at his predicament. " I didn't do anything i just found you this way." Rukia exclaimed ""my you look so cute so as a tiny. What shall i do with you?"
1111.title: looking down at u evilly

11113.content: Rukia slowly removed both her socks wiggiling her toes at their freedom. "I'm going to squish you now ichigo, don't worry though you'll be nice and safe in the soul soceity when i'm through with you". Ichigo tried to run but at his size he didn't get far. Rukia lowered her foot on ichigo pinning him to the floor. "Say bye bye ichigo!" Rukia giggled as she put more and more pressure on ichigo's body. Ichigo tried to say something anything to stop rukia but all that came out was a scream of pain until his body finally gave out to the pressure. *POP* rukia felt ichigo's pop against her sole."Well that takes care of him that was actually pretty fun wonder if i could try this type of thing on hollows". Rukia thought aloud as she twist her foot back and forth grinding what was left of ichigo into mush.
11113.title: squish him with her foot.

choices: gets smushed but sticks to sock
1112.content: Ugh a bug! Rukia said lookign down it disgust at Ichigo. "Well buggy you should feel honoured that your going to be smushed be my beatiful feet." Ichigo could onyl stare in horror as Rukia began to rais her socked foot over him. He couldnt run becaus the tremendous odour is keeping him paralyzed. Rukia sloly begins to lower her foot onto and him.
1112.title: looks down at you(thinks your a bug)

11121.content: Rukia lifts her foot up and sees a red stain on the sole of her sock adn the floor. "well thats one less bug for me to deal with." rukia drags her foot along the floor to get rid of the blood and as she walks away she whispers "bye bye Ichigo....
11121.title: he gets smushed

112.content:
Yoruichi, the one person that had plagued his mind since they first met. He stared up at her thinking thta she was a godess before turning his attention to what he loved most about her, her beautiful sweaty feet. Yes he had a foot fetish, he had had it ever since he had been kicked in the face by tatsuki when they were kids. Originally her feet had been the object of his obsession but that passed when he met yoruichi for her feet were that of a godess. Ichigo runs towards her bare feet and when he is about ten feet away he is assaulted her her pungent foot stink. Ichigo is extremely arroused by this and continues forward to her feet. As he reaches her right foot he jumps inbetween her big and second toe so that he can soak in all of her foot smell and kiss her foot. As he's kissing and worshiping her feet he hears her say."Why hello down there",

Who is she talking to?
112.title: Yoruichi

choices: tryd to find away to change him back to normal.
cruelly squashes him like a bug
1121.content: "Never thought you would be in to this kind of stuff ichigo" yoruichi said with a huge smirk on her face. "Well...uh, I...uh" ichigo tried to find the right words to use in this situation.
1121.title: Ichigo

11213.content: Yoruichi used her flash step before ichigo could move yoruichi's barefoot was already on top of him. "Really really sorry about this little ichi but you know how we cats are when we get playful we can also be a little sadistic so i'm gonna squash you now". Ichigo squirmed as the pressure on him increased he may like feet but that didn't mean he wanted to die like this. It wasn't long until ichigo lost the last of his strength trying to escape from the huge tons of flesh compressing him in to the ground. *Splat* That was all that was heard by yoruichi as she felt ichigo's body pop under her."well gotta admit that was pretty fun although i guess i should feel bad about killing ichigo". Yoruichi twisted her foot a little on his remains and with shrug walked off to handle other business.
11213.title: cruelly squashes him like a bug

" Dammit hold still" she screamed slamming her foot barely missing him but knocking him over with the aftershock. 115.title: Other

choices: thinks he is just another bug
1151.content: Ichigo looks up to see one if his friends from school. "Hey tatsuki look down its me ichigo. Help me!" Ichigo screamed to the top of his lungs trying to get her attention.
1151.title: Tatsuki

choices: tatsuki squishes the bug with her smelly foot.
11512.content:
"Huh" tatsuki exclaims seeing something small bouncing up and down. She got a closer look to se what it was. "Ugh, a bug and a pretty big one by the looks of it tatsuki looked back and forth through out the street checking to see if any one was around lucky for her the street was empty. "Sorry little guy but being a tomboy i always had a habit for crushing and torturing bugs like you.

Ichigo was estatic when tatsuki noticed his heart soon plummeted when he heard what she had planned for him. "WAIT TATSUKI LISTEN I AM NOT A BUG IT'S ME ICHIGO TAKE A CLOSER LOOK PLEASE!" Ichigo screamed in a last pointless effort to get tatsuki notice him.
11512.title: thinks he is just another bug

115122.content: Ichigo's pleas fell on deaf ears as tatsuki got ready for her fun. She quickly removed her shoes and socks wiggling her bare toes as cool air blew between them. Ichigo nearly fainted from the stench. Tatsuk'si feet smelt absolutly foul even kenpachi wouldn't be brave or crazy enough to stand up to them. "Sorry for the stench little guy i put in a lotta hard workat the dojo so my feet my reek abit" tatsuki explained with smile. "Now are you ready to pop like grape" she said her smile turning into a malicious smirk. Ichigo realizing the danger of the situation tried to run but was bit to late. Before he made it to what seemed like a mile he was suddenly sandwiched between tatsuki's feet. "Too slow little guy time to go squish now." Tatsuki chuckled. She slowly started to push her feet together applying more and more pressure to ichigo's body. Ichigo was in complete agony the pain was becoming completely unbearable he tried one last time to reason with tatsuki. "Please stop tatsuki your i'm your friend you can't do th(splat)." Ichigo's plea was cut off as the pressure finally became too much. Tatsuki pushed her feet together spreading the *bug's* guts on her foot and inbetween her toes. "Ahh just like old times" she said while scrapping the gore off her and on to the pavement. She then proceded on her way home not unaware that she just killed one of her best friends between her smelly feet.
115122.title: tatsuki squishes the bug with her smelly foot.

Since it was a weekend yuzu decided to be productive a clean the house. While sweeping she couldn't help but notice a moving spot on the floor taking a closer look she sees it is.

14.content:
Orihime was walking down the hallway to get to her class. She had been running late because a hollow had delayed her on her way to school. Just as she was about to reach her homeroom door the hollow she thought that she had killed came back. Orihime noticed that it seemed to be powering up something big because all its reitsu was starting to become more dense. A second later the was a blinding flash and everything went white.

AS Orihime began to regain conciousnes she realized that everything was giant and that the hollow was gone. As she begins to stand up she hears thundering booms coming from the end of the hall. She lloks down the hall and sees........
14.title: Orihime

choices: The hand of a boy was coming toward her
The hand of a girl was coming toward her

She started screaming his name at the top of her lungs in hopes that he would hear her. Unfortunately for her she was so small her voice was nothing more than squeaking lost in the air before her. She slowed down because she realized her attempts were futile. It wasduring this time she noticed a giant shadow behind her she turned around and screamed at the top of her lungs because the hand of
145.title: Ichigo

choices: Momo the lieutenant of Squad 5 and his childhood friend
154.content:
Captain Hitsugaya sat in his office grumbling to himself as he worked ardousley over the paperwork that his lazy lieutenant had failed to finish that day. Finally done. Hitsugaya thought as he finally finished Matsumoto's paperwork after working for two extra hours on it, he realized that this would not go on and he would either have to talk to her or get someone else to do the paperwork. As he sat there contemplating which course of action he was going to take he realized that his eyes were beginning to droop from lack of sleep. Before he had even had a chance to get up and go back to his own room Hitsugaya passed out right there at his desk and fell into a blissful sleep dreaming about a world without paperwork.

The sun began to rise over the Soul Society telling the world that it is going to be another wonderful day for all, well maybe not for one. In the office of the Tenth Division Captain if one were to walk into it right now it would appear to be empty, however unknown to everyone there is one inhabitant of this office. Captain Hitsugaya who had passed out last night after finishing some paperwork woke up as the first rays of sunshine shone on his face. 'Ugh what a long night" he thought as he continued to lie down upon the surprisingly comfy surface of wherever he had fallen asleep. 'Wait a second since when has my desk ever been comfy' Hitsugaya thought in alarm as his eyes snapped open and he bolted up to try and figure out where he had fallen asleep. Hitsugaya could only stand there in stunned silence as he stared up at the large wooden structure that took up most of his field of vision and could only stare at it in despair as he realized that it was his giant desk. He looked down at his feet and behind himself and that he was standing on his own chair which was now a thousand times to big for him, Before he could formulate a plan to get out of this mess he suddenly heard a deafening knock which he realized was actually just someone knocking on his office door. "Captain Hitsugaya are you in here", the unknown person asked opening the door. AS he heard the person ask he finally realized who it was. It was.......
154.title: Hitsugaya

info.description:
hi i havent seen many of these types of shrinking stories and the ones i have havent been reeally long or very good so here i am giving it my best shot. Now i am not very good at writing stories so im not much of a poster except for some of the character posts to try and get a story going again. so please post
300 views and still no posts come on guys......
100gps to any good posts


I have two rules
1. dont be stupid and write something like he died the end
2. no one sentence posts unless posting characters

Other than that have fun and i will not remove anything unless it goes against my rules
